body:
## Expected Behavior
No more CVEs found

## Actual Behavior
There are some CVEs found from the latest Temporal image:
temporalio/admin-tools:1.28.0

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

> Pull the latest image temporalio/admin-tools:1.28.0  from Dockerhub
> Scan the image with any vulnerability scanner

CVE | SEVERITY | CVSS | PACKAGE | VERSION | FIX IN
-- | -- | -- | -- | -- | --
CVE-2025-30204 | high     | 7.50 | github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 | v4.5.1                                | 4.5.2 
CVE-2025-30204 | high     | 7.50 | github.com/golang-jwt/jwt    | v3.2.2                                | open  
CVE-2025-22870, CWE-918 | HIGH | 8.8 	| golang.org/x/net/http/httpproxy | v0.35.0 	| 0.36.0
CVE-2025-22868, CWE-770 | HIGH | 8.7 | golang.org/x/oauth2/jws | v0.26.0 | 	0.27.0
CVE-2023-47108, CWE-770, GHSA-8pgv-569h-w5rw | HIGH | 7.5 | go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/google.golang.org/grpc/otelgrpc | v0.36.4 	| 0.46.0
CVE-2024-44337, CWE-835 | MEDIUM | 6.9 	| github.com/gomarkdown/markdown/parser | v0.0.0-20241105142532-d03b89096d81 | N/A
CVE-2024-2689  | medium   | 4.40 | go.temporal.io/server        | v1.18.1-0.20230217005328-b313b7f58641 | 1.20.5, 1.21.6, 1.22.7
CVE-2025-4575 | LOW | None 	| openssl:3.5.0-r0 	| 3.5.1-r0
CVE-2025-6965 | LOW | None 	| sqlite:3.49.2-r0 	| 3.49.2-r1
CVE-2024-51744, CWE-1118, GHSA-29wx-vh33-7x7r 	| LOW 	| 2.3 	| github.com/golang-jwt/jwt | v3.2.2+incompatible 	| N/A

comments.body: some CVEs are resolved in latest version v1.28.1. The new reported CVEs are informed in https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/issues/8219

title: Addressing security vulnerabilities in the Temporalio/admin-tools :1.28.0
